Control Name: Designs Detection Measures—Detection measures are implemented to identify anomalies that could result from environmental threat events.

control_attributes.Control: Designs Detection Measures—Detection measures are implemented to identify anomalies that could result from environmental threat events.
control_attributes.SubCategory: A1.2 The entity authorizes, designs, develops or acquires, implements, operates, approves, maintains, and monitors environmental protections, software, data back-up processes, and recovery infrastructure to meet its objectives.
